about_the_game:
Evil Bird Simulator is a light and funny casual cartoon 2d side scrolling game where the main player is a bird that poops on people and cars. This is a casual game with simple controls and gameplay, and will make you smile and laugh at some of the interactions. If the main player dies in this game, they will go to hell, and the player must fly their way out of hell as a skeleton bird, and then they will be able return to the main game.

This game consists of 7 unique levels in 7 different scenarios with unique enemies and interactions in each level. The player must earn enough points by crapping on people and cars to complete the level. Once the level is complete, the player will unlock the next level until the player reaches the end of the game. The player has only a limited amount of crap and must collect food for additional ammo. The player also has hearts, and when hurt will lose a heart.. When the player runs out of hearts, they will die and go to hell, where they must fly their way out of hell. When a player gets hit in hell, they will lose their points and will not be able to escape hell until they earn enough points to get out of hell.

This game is story based, and there is a story and screen shots between levels. The story is light, funny and mildly crude. This game does not contain any blood or gore. It is strictly a cartoon game that is light and funny.
